norepinephrine.neutral: Norepinephrine is a neurotransmitter involved in alertness and stress response. Imbalances can affect anxiety and mood disorders.

gaba.neutral: GABA is an inhibitory neurotransmitter that calms brain activity. Low levels are linked to anxiety and epilepsy.
